TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Wolf.
You have failed to defeat the Doomknight.
You can either continue to chase the wolf pack or help them reclaim their homeland from the Undead.
Chase away the wolf pack that's been terrorizing the Elves at Tirianin.
Chase away the wolf pack or help the wolf pack reclaim their homeland.
You have successfully chased away the wolf pack. You receive the Wolfbane Cloak.
You have defeated the Doomknight. The Wolves can return to their home.
